sentences.en: Apart from being lethal, Bond is best known for his seduction.
sentences.cn: 且不说狠心, 邦德是因为魅力而被人周知的.

sentences.en: But flirting always brings the risk of seduction.
sentences.cn: 这些调整往往会因为利益而带来大量风险.
克里奥帕特拉对凯撒的引诱

sentences.en: Don't assume that seduction is just about sex, because it is NOT.
sentences.cn: 不要以为色诱仅仅是为了爱爱, 因为事实并不是这样的.

sentences.en: Her methods of seduction are subtle.
sentences.cn: 她勾引人的手段很巧妙。

sentences.en: If possible, you want to use all of these value - building elements in each seduction.
sentences.cn: 假如有机会,在每次引诱中, 你想用上面所有的方法建立价值.

sentences.en: If you do, she thinks it is just one of men's tacties for seduction.
sentences.cn: 要是你小心照顾她过马路, 她又会说这是男人的花招.

sentences.en: More will be written about group seduction and group illusions in the year ahead.
sentences.cn: 在来年,将有更多内容写到团队欲望和团队幻相.

sentences.en: The initiative seduction always consists in awakening slumbering appearances.
sentences.cn: 创始的诱拐总是在于唤醒昏睡的表象.

sentences.en: The model's seduction is obvious: China's growth has been extraordinary.
sentences.cn: 这种模式的吸引力是显然易见的: 中国的经济增长非同寻常.

sentences.en: The seduction hypothesis is merely a formal abstraction.
sentences.cn: 诱拐的假设仅仅是正式的抽象化.

sentences.en: The Seduction Science guy across the room deliberately, with purposeful control.
sentences.cn: 把妹达人有目的的全场移动, 有针对性的控制.

sentences.en: The Seduction Science guy isn't hypnotized dance floor.
sentences.cn: 把妹达人不会被舞池催眠.

sentences.en: This was a case of sly, evil seduction as well as murder.
sentences.cn: 这是一件狡猾 、 恶毒的诱奸案和谋杀案.

trans.tran_cn: 诱惑，引诱，被引诱，诱惑物
trans.tran_en: something that strongly attracts people, but often has a bad effect on their lives
